title: Blog Post Generation Schema
description: Schema for generating blog posts programmatically. Use this template to create 20 new articles.

slug.description: URL-friendly slug (lowercase, hyphens, no spaces). Example: 'how-to-optimize-wordpress-performance'

url.description: Full URL of the post (if published). If generating new posts, use format: 'https://krischase.com/blog/{slug}'

title.description: Post title (without ' - Kris Chase' suffix). Example: 'How to Optimize WordPress Performance'

description.description: Post excerpt/description (used for meta description and previews). Should be 120-160 characters for SEO.

content.description: Full markdown content of the post. Can include code blocks, images, lists, etc. Should be substantial (minimum 200 words).

tags.description: Array of relevant tags. Should include 2-8 tags related to the content. Common tags: WordPress, PHP, Security, Bash, SQL, API, etc.

publishedDate.description: Publication date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD). Example: '2024-12-09'

originalDate.description: Original date string (if different format). Example: '2024.12.09' or 'December 9, 2024'

featuredImage.description: Featured image URL (optional). Should be a full URL to an image. Example: 'https://krischase.com/images/featured-image.jpg'

firstImage.description: First image from content (fallback if no featured image). Should be extracted from content or provided separately.

metaTitle.description: Meta title (usually same as title + ' - Kris Chase'). Should be 50-60 characters.

metaDescription.description: Meta description (usually same as description). Should be 120-160 characters.

ogTitle.description: Open Graph title (for social sharing). Usually same as metaTitle.

ogDescription.description: Open Graph description (for social sharing). Usually same as metaDescription.

ogImage.description: Open Graph image URL (for social sharing). Should be 1200x630px recommended.

readingTime.description: Estimated reading time in minutes. Calculated as: wordCount / 225 (average reading speed). Auto-calculated if not provided.

wordCount.description: Word count of the content. Auto-calculated from markdown if not provided.

updatedDate.description: Last updated date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD) if post was updated after publication.

isUpdated.description: Whether the post has been updated after initial publication.
